column1: Little Goat Diner////This is a wonderful place to grab a wifi and delish bite to eat. I have been here now three times and I've never been disappointed with my choices. For breakfast
column2: I would recommend the bull's eye French toast. Eggs
column4: BBQ maple syrup and strawberries. For something filling but lighter
column6: a huge salad that comes with falafel (even if not listed on the menu). Affordable
column7: tasty place to bring family and friends with minimal wait time!
